comment: I didn’t think I would use the echo as much as I do. I really enjoy asking Alexa all kinds of questions including weather, history, jokes, etc. She tells me etas & when my packages have arrived. She sends me reminders to do things. In the morning I get a whole good morning message LOL. I tell Alexa to play radio stations for me & almost anything you can think of including turning on TV, running my irobot, etc. This echo can do so much for a little speaker. If you’re considering trying one, do it just buy it
The music sounds good, it even has some base.
I purchased this for my recently widowed 85-year old mother. Having an Alexa enabled device in her home allows her to easily fill her space with sound.
I'm not very tech savy but this was easy to set up and love  using it
Very useful and love that is blends in with my tv stand you can barely notice it!
The Echo Dot works very well, no complaints

review_title: The product overall is very useful to me.
comment: I liked the product, especially because i’m constantly listening to music. It’s very resourceful.
Esta muy bueno por el precio , vale la pena, me gusto mucho .
